hint.text: The value can be obtained using the tally marks.

solution.text:
From the table, we can see that the number of students who have scored between \((10-20)\) and \((20-30)\) are \(5\) and \(4\) respectively. (Using tally marks.)
Therefore, the number of students who have scored between \(10\) and \(30\) marks are :
\(5+4=9\)

content.text: How many students have scored between \(10\) and \(30\) marks?
